turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to order I'd like to order some iced coffee from Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, did you want to add any milk?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, what size did you want to get your iced coffee?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: confirming your order for a tall iced coffee with 2% milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, it will be ready for pickup in 5 minutes at westlake shopping center, daly city.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you very much. Oh, that's wonderful. Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your receipt will be texted to you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help with anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, you've been a big help. Thank you very much. Have a really wonderful day. Will do.
